hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
SELECT EOLO.EOLO_ID, EOLO.CREATOR, EOLO.CREATE_TIME, EOLO.MODIFIER, EOLO.MODIFY_TIME, EOLO.REC_VER, EOLO.REC_STATUS, EOLO.COMPANY_CODE, EOLO.SITE_CODE, EOLO.COMPANY_NAME, EOLO.SITE_NAME, EOLO.EOLO_WORK_ORDER_NO, EOLO.EOLO_OPERATE_NAME, EOLO.EOLO_OPERATE_CODE,
EOLO.EOLO_OPERATE_TYPE_CODE, (select eb.ebcd_name_cn from eb_code_master eb where eb.ebcd_dictionary_type = 'OMS_NOTE_TYPE' and eb.ebcd_code = EOLO_OPERATE_TYPE_CODE ) EOLO_OPERATE_TYPE_NAME,
EOLO.EOLO_OPERATE_TIME, EOLO.EOLO_REMARK, EOLO.EOLO_ORDER_NO, EOLO.EOLO_NODE_TYPE,
(select eb.ebcd_name_cn from eb_code_master eb where eb.ebcd_dictionary_type = 'OMS_MILESTONE_NODE' and eb.ebcd_code = EOLO_NODE_TYPE ) EOLO_NODE_TYPE_NAME,
EOLO.EOLO_LINK_LOGISTIC_NO, EOLO.EOLO_DOWNSTREAM_NO, EOLO.EOLO_OPERATE_QTY, nvl(EOLO.EOLO_IS_ALL_HOMEWORK,1) EOLO_IS_ALL_HOMEWORK, nvl(EOLO.EOLO_REVERSE_LOGO,0) EOLO_REVERSE_LOGO, EOWO.EOWO_SOURCE_SYS, EOWO.EOWO_LOGISTIC_NO, EOWO.EOWO_EXPRESS_NO, EOWO.EOWO_CARRIER_CODE FROM EO_LOG_WORK EOLO LEFT JOIN EO_WORK_ORDER EOWO ON EOLO.EOLO_WORK_ORDER_NO = EOWO.EOWO_WORK_ORDER_NO WHERE 1=1 << AND EOWO.EOWO_SOURCE_SYS IN (:eowoSourceSys)>> <<AND EOLO.EOLO_ID LIKE :eoloId>> <<AND EOLO.CREATOR LIKE :creator>> <<AND EOLO.CREATE_TIME > :createTimeFrom>> <<AND EOLO.CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeTo + 1>> <<AND EOLO.MODIFIER LIKE :modifier>> <<AND EOLO.MODIFY_TIME > :modifyTimeFrom>> <<AND EOLO.MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeTo + 1>> <<AND EOLO.REC_VER LIKE :recVer>> <<AND EOLO.REC_STATUS LIKE :recStatus>> <<AND EOLO.COMPANY_CODE LIKE :companyCode>> <<AND EOLO.SITE_CODE LIKE :siteCode>> <<AND EOLO.COMPANY_NAME LIKE :companyName>> <<AND EOLO.SITE_NAME LIKE :siteName>> <<AND EOLO.EOLO_WORK_ORDER_NO LIKE :eoloWorkOrderNo>> <<AND EOLO.EOLO_OPERATE_NAME LIKE :eoloOperateName>> <<AND EOLO.EOLO_OPERATE_CODE LIKE :eoloOperateCode>> <<AND EOLO.EOLO_OPERATE_TYPE_CODE LIKE :eoloOperateTypeCode>> <<AND EOLO.EOLO_OPERATE_TYPE_NAME LIKE :eoloOperateTypeName>> <<AND EOLO.EOLO_OPERATE_TIME LIKE :eoloOperateTime>> <<AND EOLO.EOLO_REMARK LIKE :eoloRemark>> <<AND EOLO.EOLO_ORDER_NO LIKE :eoloOrderNo>> <<AND EOLO.EOLO_NODE_TYPE LIKE :eoloNodeType>> <<AND EOLO.EOLO_LINK_LOGISTIC_NO LIKE :eoloLinkLogisticNo>> <<AND EOLO.EOLO_DOWNSTREAM_NO LIKE :eoloDownstreamNo>> <<AND EOLO.EOLO_OPERATE_QTY LIKE :eoloOperateQty>> <<AND EOLO.EOLO_IS_ALL_HOMEWORK LIKE :eoloIsAllHomework>> <<AND EOLO.EOLO_REVERSE_LOGO LIKE :eoloReverseLogo>> <<AND EOLO.EOLO_WORK_ORDER_NO IN (:eoloWorkOrderNos)>> <<AND EOLO.EOLO_PUSH_FLAG LIKE :eoloPushFlag>> <#if limitRowNum == 'Y'> AND rownum<=:rowNumSize </#if> ${queryPlanDefinedSql} ${queryPlanSortSql}
